data.name: Battle Ball
data.detailed_description:
Battle Ball is a goofy multiplayer game about dodgeball, with more explosions and fewer rules. The goal in Battle Ball is to knock as many opponents out as you can in under 3 minutes. Team up with friends or join random players!

Don't have any friends? No problem! With version 1.1 Battle Ball now has a single-player mode where you can battle bots.


Express Yourself

Earn Dodgebucks by playing in matches to spice up your look with crazy hats and outfits


About the Dev

Dad Hat Games is an independent studio, currently consisting of one member, who is passionate about creating fun experiences and looking forward to creating more projects

data.short_description: Battle Ball is a goofy online multiplayer game. Play with your team in a 3 v 3 game of loose-rules dodgeball meets twin-stick shooter. Play with your friends or knock them out by teaming up with random players!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2nd generation Core i3, AMD A6, or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GT, AMD 5670, Intel HD 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

  • Processor: 2nd generation Core i3, AMD A6, or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

  • Storage: 500 MB available space
